name: tmr-tradinglanka-api
description: Enterprise-grade backend API for TMR Trading Lanka Business Management System

scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm ls inflight rimraf @humanwhocodes/object-schema @humanwhocodes/config-array are-we-there-yet gauge || true && tsc --skipLibCheck || npm run build:fallback
scripts.build:fallback: echo 'TypeScript compilation failed, using fallback build' && npm run manual-copy-src && npm run manual-copy-assets
scripts.manual-copy-src: mkdir -p dist/utils dist/models dist/routes dist/middleware dist/config dist/auth && cp -r src/utils/* dist/utils/ && cp -r src/models/* dist/models/ && cp -r src/routes/* dist/routes/ && cp -r src/middleware/* dist/middleware/ && cp -r src/config/* dist/config/ && cp -r src/auth/* dist/auth/ && cp src/server.js dist/ || echo 'Manual copy completed with some warnings'
scripts.manual-copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/templates && cp -r src/templates/* dist/templates/ || echo 'No templates to copy'
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/templates && cp -r src/templates/* dist/templates/ || echo 'No templates to copy'
scripts.copy-assets-win: if not exist dist\templates mkdir dist\templates && if exist src\templates\* xcopy /y /s src\templates\* dist\templates\

author: Uminda Herath <contact@uhadev.com> (https://uhadev.com)
